exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} t : pbtree Ht : distinct_pbleaves t Unable to unify "distinct_pbleaves t" with "distinct_pbleaves (pbleft (pbleft t))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> distinct_pbleaves (pbleft t)

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
distinct_pbleaves = fun t : pbtree => forall t0 t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb (pbnode t1 t2) t -> inpb t0 t1 -> inpb t0 t2 -> False : pbtree -> Prop
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
distinct_pbleaves_pl : forall t1 : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves (pbleft t1) -> distinct_pbleaves t1
distinct_pbleaves_pr : forall t1 : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves (pbright t1) -> distinct_pbleaves t1
inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1)
Inductive inpb : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop := inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t | inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1) | inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1) | inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2) | inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
distinct_pbleaves_r : forall t1 t2 : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves (pbnode t1 t2) -> distinct_pbleaves t2
distinct_pbleaves_l : forall t1 t2 : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves (pbnode t1 t2) -> distinct_pbleaves t1
inpb_ind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpb_sind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> SProp, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
weight_tree_compute : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> (forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t) m) = weight_tree f t
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop] ?B : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop] ?B : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Prop]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type] ?B : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
pbtree_dec : forall a b : pbtree, {a = b} + {a <> b}
inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t
inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1)
inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
distinct_pbleaves_pbleaf : forall a : A, distinct_pbleaves (pbleaf a)
distinct_pbleaves_Leaf : forall a : A, distinct_pbleaves (pbleaf a)
inpb_ex : forall t : pbtree, exists x : A, inpb (pbleaf x) t
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type empty : A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]

intros t Ht.
apply distinct_pbleaves_pl.
exact Ht.
Qed.
